subject: Re: [junit] need help combining UML with the Junit
msgSnippet: roua, Generating JUnit test cases from JML has been done on a research basis.  I m not aware of an enterprise-ready tool to do it automatically.  Good luck,
messageBody:
roua,

Generating JUnit test cases from JML has been done on a research
basis. I'm not aware of an enterprise-ready tool to do it
automatically. Good luck,

David Saff

On Tue, Feb 22, 2011 at 10:48 AM, roua al-taee <rouadream@...> wrote:
> dear professor david,
> u have no idea how much i'm happy with your answer,
> what about using the JML with the Junit????
> the JML gives the needed info for the code generation and the Junit
> specification.
> do u think it can work with the UML
> ????
>
>
